lead_paragraph: GUINTHER--Frederick Ernest, Jr. of Forest Hills, NY. Born on August 25, 1932, died on April 18, 2016. Beloved husband of Dolly Davis and father of Louise Guinther and Joanna Friedman. An Army Veteran and public relations man for Russell Birdwell, Inc., Zachary, Liss & Front and Doremus, he was a former president of the Columbia Players, warden of St. Luke's Church and esteemed co-founder of the Gingerbread Players. Funeral on Monday, April 25 at 10am at St. Luke's, 85 Greenway South, Forest Hills, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GUINTHER, FREDERICK ERNEST
